-- Views for Dimensions

-- -- Source System Data
-- CREATE VIEW  LDW.vwTrips
-- AS
-- SELECT * FROM
-- OPENROWSET
-- (BULK 'nyctlc/yellow/puYear=*/puMonth=*/*.parquet',  -- Specify the path of the file
-- DATA_SOURCE='ExternalDataSourceDataLake2',   -- Specify the source you created on top your storage account(datalake)
-- FORMAT='PARQUET' 
-- ) as result

-- where result.filepath(1) in ( '2017,2018')
-- and result.filepath(2) in ( '11','12','13')



CREATE VIEW LDW.NYCTrips2
AS
SELECT
    *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK     'https://azureopendatastorage.blob.core.windows.net/nyctlc/yellow/puYear=*/puMonth=*/*.parquet',
        FORMAT = 'parquet'
    ) AS [result];



    CREATE VIEW LDW.Trips3
AS
SELECT
    *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://synapsedatalake55.dfs.core.windows.net/synpasecontainer/NYCTripSmall.parquet',
        FORMAT='PARQUET'
    ) AS dimension 




    CREATE VIEW LDW.Trips4
AS
SELECT
    *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://synapsedatalake55.dfs.core.windows.net/synpasecontainer/NYCTripSmall.parquet',
        FORMAT='PARQUET'
    ) AS dimension
